title: Type ID: Church's English Shoes
content:
Hi all,

I have been very unsuccessful in my attempts so far in finding out what typeface the tag-line "English shoes" is.

Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130131045047im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Churches_logo_6266.jpg)
author: jedadia23

comments.content:
It's a bit small to see very well, but [Poetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20130131045047/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/poetica/) might be close if you backslanted it a bit.  
- Mike Yanega
